name: Banyat Boonkaew
summary: Creative Front End Developer offering 4+ years of experience providing strong Javascript Framework included Vue.js and React.js. And improving Back End Skills with Loopback, PostgreSQL and Firebase. I can develop web-based applications in a wide range for customer requirements with new web-based technologies. I am eager to learn new things that can improve skills or productivities in my job.

jobs: Worked with Top Food Industry Company to create Food Chain Mangement System. Included member, audit, specification and complain system by using Vue.js and Loopback.
Created Logistics Management System to collect all paper bills and excel sheets in one system by using React.js and Firebase.
Developed web app for Online Learning Management System by using Vue.js.
Created website using Wordpress by followed Search Engine Optimization Instruction.
Installed Wordpress on unmanaged server by using LEMP Stack and following security vulnerabilities.

achievements: Collect all specification papers into online system that advantage to searching, classifying, updating, alerting.
Reduce time to fill data from pdf file by using Google Vision API to convert pdf to text and record some data in the system.
Reduce time to develop for pdf generator by using docx template. Customer can edit and upload to server by themselves.
interests: UX, I am interested in learning UX due to I wish to provide meaningful and relevant experiences to users. I am one of the volunteers in UX Thailand Community.

Financial, I have learnt everything about the financial knowledge since graduation. And I have applied development knowledge to create automatically trading bot for crypto currency by using Python, Tradingview (Pine script) and Firebase.
Mobile App, I am learning Flutter to create mobile app.
Line API, I try to use Line API with side projects.
Running, I achieved my goal for SUB1 in Mini Marathon and SUB2 in Half Marathon.
